snippet.description: Books Books Without Borders, Volume 2 : Perspectives from South Asia / Fraser, Robert This volume focuses on the publisher's series as a cultural formation - a material artifact and component of cultural hierarchies. [...] Basingstoke : Palgrave Macmillan, 2008. - 224 p. ebook

snippet.title: Flavor network and the principles of food pairing
snippet.description: Flavor network and the principles of food pairing / Ahn, Yong-Yeol ; Ahnert, Sebastian E ; Bagrow, James P ; Barabási, Albert-László The cultural diversity of culinary practice, as illustrated by the variety of regional cuisines, raises the question of whether there are any general patterns that determine the ingredient combinations used in food today or principles that transcend individual tastes and recipes. [...] arXiv:1111.6074. \- 2011\. Preprint

snippet.title: Transformative Organizations : A Global Perspective
snippet.description: Transformative Organizations : A Global Perspective / Gupta, Vipin With its rich diversity of perspectives offered by 44 contributors drawn from around the world and with valuable inputs from the GLOBE India Investigator Network, this is a comprehensive volume on the transformational organization and change management in the Asian and trans-Asian context [...] New Delhi : Sage, 2004. - 545 p.

snippet.title: Numerical Notation : A Comparative History
snippet.description: Numerical Notation : A Comparative History / Chrisomalis, Stephen This book is a cross-cultural reference volume of all attested numerical notation systems, encompassing more than 100 such systems used over the past 5,500 years.. Leiden : Cambridge University Press, 2010. - 498 p. ebook
